name: Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo
summary: The Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo, in 2018, was the second event organized by Joel "Vargskelethor" Johannson of Vinesauce, the followup to Vine Mapping Contest 2016. The rules were to make a single map, for GZDoom, and to not use any copyrighted MP3 music that could cause DMCA issues when streamed.
